channel.title: Error when i try to log on
channel.description:
Ok, I'm not java-retarded, I just have no clue what's going on with the deltascape source. My little brother convinced me to try to convert to it for him, so I did. It's been problem after problem, and this is one I can't get rid of myself. I don't have the slightest clue. I log on then get kicked and this message appears in the run.bat
[code]DeltaScape Server. Connection from 192.168.1.65:1427 java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.removeGroundItem(client.java:15343) at ItemHandler.removeItemAll(ItemHandler.java:138) at ItemHandler.process(ItemHandler.java:345) at process.run(process.java:26) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [client-1-Fake it]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 2 ms] Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Fake it. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15267) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:272) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client Fake it disconnected (192.168.1.65) [/code]
If anyone has a clue has to fix that I'd be grateful, otherwise back to the old source...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 07, 2008, 01:20:32 pm[/size][hr]Sorry mods for double post, I went to the client.java line 15267, now it's a bunch of stuff monitering the log ons, if I used the simple take out */ and /* do you think it would work? I'm going to give it a shot but I'm not sure how it will turn out..

item.title: Error when i try to log on
item.dc:creator: @Th3-Pk3r Th3-Pk3r
item.description:
@Th3-Pk3r wrote:

same thing for me. u may need to client

item.title: Error when i try to log on
item.dc:creator: @dragon_0o0 dragon 0o0
item.description:
@dragon_0o0 wrote:

Ok, I’m not java-retarded, I just have no clue what’s going on with the deltascape source. My little brother convinced me to try to convert to it for him, so I did. It’s been problem after problem, and this is one I can’t get rid of myself. I don’t have the slightest clue. I log on then get kicked and this message appears in the run.bat

DeltaScape Server. Connection from 192.168.1.65:1427 java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.removeGroundItem(client.java:15343) at ItemHandler.removeItemAll(ItemHandler.java:138) at ItemHandler.process(ItemHandler.java:345) at process.run(process.java:26) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [client-1-Fake it]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 2 ms] Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Fake it. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15267) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:272) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client Fake it disconnected (192.168.1.65)

If anyone has a clue has to fix that I’d be grateful, otherwise back to the old source…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 07, 2008, 01:20:32 pm[/size][hr]Sorry mods for double post, I went to the client.java line 15267, now it’s a bunch of stuff monitering the log ons, if I used the simple take out / and / do you think it would work? I’m going to give it a shot but I’m not sure how it will turn out…
